eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.util

Class RoutingTask

  • java.lang.Object
      • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.util.RoutingTask

  • public class RoutingTask
extends
    Class to get a route between a start and a destination point, going through a list of waypoints. It uses MapQuest open, public and free API, based on OpenStreetMap data. See http://open.mapquestapi.com/guidance
    Author:
    Dylan Stenico
